attributes.action: Give the divers who rescued the Thai boys the George cross and a knighthood.
attributes.background: If there was ever an example of selfless bravery, risking their lives to save others then this is the epitome of one. The three divers John Volanthen, Rick Stanton and Jason Mallinson all deserve formal recognition.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
